title: [pytorch] [feature request] Batched matrix inverse
body_html:
import torch, numpy as np
a = torch.rand(2,3,4,4)

print(np.linalg.inv(a).shape)
# (2, 3, 4, 4)

print(torch.inverse(a).shape)
# RuntimeError: invalid argument 1: A should be 2 dimensional at .../aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.cpp:492

If implemented, this would also replace https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/distributions/multivariate_normal.py#L50

Please feel free to close this issue if tracking in #7500 is preferred.
